root.name: Luxor: Quest for the Afterlife
root.description: Match colorful spheres and choose your own path on a journey out of Egypt in Luxor 4 Deluxe! Wield the falcon-wing shooter of Horus, track down the thieves who have stolen Queen Nefertiti's artifacts, defeat them in the all-new Battle Mode and set Nefertiti's spirit free. Begin this incredible adventure today!
